channel.title: Syrinity 317 Development
channel.description:
[img]http://syrinity.net/images/logo.png[/img]
Information ____________________________
Hello, welcome to Syrinity's advertisement page. We have been in development for about three weeks now working to create the ideal server for all players. We will be striving to create content that our players will enjoy and have fun playing. Our plans in development are to work on one area at a time perfecting that certain feature before moving onto the next. We want to create a smooth gameplay with a large amount of skills, mini-games, bosses and events for our players to use throughout their gameplay. Our server will not be one of which you will be maxing out your skills with in minutes of game time. Our skilling will take some effort due to the fact we look to have skilling have a huge impact in our economy. Combat training will also not be skills you will max out within minutes of gameplay.
Development Team ____________________________
P.L , C.M - Anthony C.M - Jamie S.D - Robert, Landon C.D - Patrick
*Key* P.L (project leader), C.M (Community Management), S.D (Server Development), and C.D (Client Development)
Features ____________________________ Well setup website (easy to operate) Server hosted off a vps Website hosted off a Dedi All skills working fully functional Varius bosses (Corp Beast, Kbd, Bork, Choas Elemental, Giant Sea Snake, Godwars (All Four), Giant Mole, Tormented Demons) Various minigames (Castle wars, Duel arena, Pest control, Barbarian assult, Warriors guild, Fight pits, Fight caves) Automatic Vote and Donation system Active and friendly staff Constant upates
Media ____________________________

and lastly I can cover all your basic stuff… shops,teleports,animations,ingame gfx, objects around the world, npcs + their chats, point systems and more… so ye, the skype is there.[/quote]

item.title: Syrinity 317 Development
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

Hello, i am in search of three developers who have a decent amount of experience in programming java. We are working with a pretty basic PI and clean client released by eliminate. The project has sufficient funds and already have a domain and hosting. Ill post the application format below. The server is pretty much empty content wise because we have lost our two main developers and we are in search of a new team.

Plans for the server

[QUOTE]-All skills working
-Flawless combat
-Variety of Bosses
-Variety of Minigames
-Good fair donator benefits[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]Skype:
Previous work:
Age:
Any extra information:[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
